column4:
GREAT NEWS! 

Under @realDonaldTrump & GOP leadership, we’re rebuilding our economy and restoring jobs for Americans hit hard by the pandemic. 

More work must be done, but the LAST thing we should do is raise taxes as the radical Left wants.

https://t.co/IeTvgfTMOi

Once again, Schumer/Dems blocked COVID-19 relief for Montanans. 

Today’s $500 billion relief package included $$ for MT workers, families & small biz, vaccines, therapeutic drugs, testing, farmers & ranchers, schools, Tribes, and USPS.

Enough is enough. We must pass relief NOW.

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for signing my bipartisan bill into law that will provide critical mental health services and resources to Montana veterans who have served our country.

I’ll always fight to support our Montana heroes.

Great morning w/ @USDA Under Sec. Ibach, @MTStockgrowers, @MTFarmBureau & @uscattlemen announcing new testing guidelines for brucellosis. 

This disease is a threat to our MT cattle producers and expanding testing is critical to helping protect MT ag. https://t.co/eMzllJdGFQ

Visited with Northern Cheyenne Tribal leaders today and talked about several issues impacting the community including COVID-19. This virus is devastating our Tribal communities. We must do all we can to protect them. https://t.co/tiGFRSuaoS

Met with Crow Tribal Chairman AJ Not Afraid today to discuss COVID-19 on the reservation and to drop off much needed supplies for the community to help stay healthy & combat the pandemic. https://t.co/qjsthO9jBK
MT veterans dedicated their lives defending our freedom. We must do all we can to ensure our retired Montana heroes have the healthcare they earned. https://t.co/O3mufQjm8N
Cindy and I are wishing @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS a speedy recovery - Montanans are with you as you beat this virus!!
An honor to join @SecWilkie at the David J. Thatcher VA Clinic this afternoon in Missoula to thank staff for their hard work helping our Montana veterans during this pandemic. https://t.co/hVoQp8km1L

Justice Ginsburg lived an incredible life, full of historic accomplishments. She was a courageous fighter in both the courtroom and in her longtime health battles. My deepest condolences to the family, friends and Americans mourning her passing.
Shana Tovah to everyone celebrating #RoshHashanah! Best wishes for a healthy, sweet & happy new year.

Great to see Kleen Kart Technologies new mobile disinfecting unit in action today at Hellgate Middle School. This will 
help keep MT students and teachers safe from COVID-19. https://t.co/RuoNvzuZG4

MT is only one of four states in the country NOT reporting cases / deaths of COVID-19 in long term care facilities. That is unacceptable. 

@GovernorBullock - we must protect our MT seniors, we need transparency NOW. https://t.co/oIhjJYfNsB

As a dad of 4, I can't imagine missing out on watching my kids play sports. I’ve heard from parents across MT and they want leadership on this issue NOW. It's time for Gov. Bullock to step up and work with parents, coaches, schools & health officials on a plan for this season.

Throughout my travels across MT, one event I enjoy year after year is Crow Fair, I too have the #CrowFairBlues but I want to wish everyone health and happiness on this Apsáalooke (Crow) New Year. Looking forward to joining Chairman Not Afraid next year! https://t.co/tn2oXoeyQx

Met with some of Montana’s local leaders this morning at the new construction site of Dahl Memorial Healthcare in Ekalaka to talk about the importance of this facility for rural health. https://t.co/wdSmIWPvGs

My bipartisan forest management bill will help support good paying timber jobs, protect Montana communities from deadly wildfires and promote public safety and health in a time when we need it most. 

https://t.co/4ERcNoBYCO

Glad to see a bipartisan bill I cosponsored pass the Senate tonight that will help Montana veterans receive critical mental health services. We must do all we can to support our veterans, especially during these unprecedented times.
It protects public health & safety - which is even more important during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/KRR812BrU4

Glad to have intro’d a bipartisan wildfire protection bill with @SenFeinstein. 

We must protect our communities from deadly wildfires, support timber jobs & improve forest health - especially during COVID-19. 

https://t.co/JPor6vaV7c
Montanans who've lost their job due to COVID-19 should be able to keep their health coverage – that’s what I’m fighting for. https://t.co/w6byYPUa0r
These shipments are critical to supporting Montanans hospitalized with COVID-19. https://t.co/BkPYcH4xMc

Montanans who lost their job due to COVID-19 should be able to afford & keep their employer-based health insurance. 

https://t.co/l0FeQhhQy5

Secured critical relief for small businesses, child care, and COVID vaccines/treatments in the next round of aid.  I look forward to getting this done for Montanans.
https://t.co/oRzGX9fHXc
Good conversation earlier this week with the FDA and Montana healthcare leaders on the progress we're making with a COVID-19 vaccine. https://t.co/POg6YPmaUJ
A COVID-19 vaccine is how we get back to normal and stop the pandemic.  That’s why I’ve been committed to getting this done. https://t.co/RpnJddS4hp

.@realDonaldTrump is right to call for payroll tax relief. I’ve been pushing for this since the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic bc it will help put money in the pockets of Montana families & serve as a back to work bonus.

Great discussion with Montana farmers and ranchers, ag businesses & @USDA @BillAtUSDA in Great Falls today on COVID-19 resources, cattle market manipulation and other issues facing Montana ag. https://t.co/zF6UT7xOcU

Great to join the Flathead County Business Recovery Team today to discuss ways to continue to protect the public health of Montanans, help keep MT small businesses open and workers employed as we navigate through COVID-19. https://t.co/A2T4pXOSRp
Honored to be a part of Friday’s groundbreaking in Missoula.  Proud to have helped get this done and to provide better healthcare for our Montana veterans. https://t.co/f8Q0eQAzsI

Cindy and I are praying for the families who have tragically lost loved ones to COVID-19 due to the outbreak at Canyon Creek Memory Care as well as those who have tested positive for the virus.

https://t.co/OIT9nZ7IO4
As cases continue to rise across Montana, I’m committed to protecting our elderly.  This bill will give our nursing homes the tools they need to keep folks safe. https://t.co/vKzdMAr4wM

I will continue working to get MT seniors the care and support they need during the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic! 

https://t.co/ZxyowXnnjX
Spoke with Billings healthcare leaders & local elected officials this morning.  Thankful for their leadership during this pandemic. https://t.co/VLQ3BxBUnG
Headed into a big holiday weekend!  #MaskUpMT https://t.co/vjFImaKebL
Outrageous. We MUST hold China & the @WHO accountable for their cover-up of COVID-19. https://t.co/1wNnQ3CP6s
And thank you to Montana bankers for working overtime to help our small businesses stay open and workers employed during the COVID-19 pandemic.

It's clear that China was withholding vital information on the Coronavirus from the world, and the World Health Organization was covering for them. China and the WHO must be held accountable for their actions.

https://t.co/G1hgwtMqbL

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your swift action! Our brave guardsmen and women need the assurance that their benefits are protected as they serve our communities during the COVID-19 outbreak. https://t.co/DGsWw1A79k

Our small businesses in Montana have been hit hard during this pandemic.  That’s why I’m working on a bipartisan bill to support our small businesses with 20-employees or less.
https://t.co/I7vTW2sQmr

Today, @USDA announced that farmers and ranchers can now submit applications to the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program. 

This is great news for Montana’s farmers and ranchers who have seen some difficult losses during the outbreak. 

https://t.co/KkhgPdUTbd
Proud to be fighting for Montana’s small businesses and workers to ensure they have the resources they need to overcome the financial burden of COVID-19. https://t.co/0ebHXeCMlF

Today, Cindy & I sponsored 10 MT veterans to cover their dues for membership with the MT @AmericanLegion.   Many of our vets are facing financial hardship due to COVID-19. For more information on how you can help veterans in your community reach out to your local American Legion.

With public health and emergency services supported by local governments & communities, it’s important that they have the resources needed to continue to combat COVID-19. 

https://t.co/W9qyJEyV2s
Grateful to @realDonaldTrump for listening to my concerns & for rolling back burdensome, heavy-handed regulations so our economy can bounce back after this pandemic.

Last thing Montana workers and small businesses need during this pandemic is more red tape and government regulations.

https://t.co/lJNuCFOYdc
Glad to have secured this PPE for Montana from Taiwan. I will continue working to ensure the needs of our healthcare heroes and first responders are met during this crisis. https://t.co/psubJeYSm9

After my request, Taiwan is giving 30,000 masks to Montana for our health care workers and first responders on the front lines fighting this pandemic. I’m glad to have secured this shipment for Montana.

Honored to work alongside @realDonaldTrump to get our nation’s leading scientists the resources needed to accelerate the development and manufacturing of a drug to treat & prevent COVID-19. https://t.co/I8SiXaECyw
Glad this critical PPE is coming to nursing homes in Montana. We must protect our most vulnerable residents during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/66EwPvYjaK

This will get MT seniors and the disabled the resources they need to stay safe and healthy during this pandemic.  Glad to have gotten this done on their behalf.   
https://t.co/HPXDLM2O7J

Thank you to our nurses who are on the front lines of this pandemic.  Today, and every day, you save the lives of so many - thank you for your service and courage.  #NationalNursesDay #HealthcareHeroes

We must end our dependence on China for drug manufacturing – it’s a national health AND a national security risk.

That’s why I’m pushing to strengthen our medical supply chain here in America. https://t.co/OOGO2Mvor2

China’s cover up of COVID-19 made this pandemic worse. Our economy shut down & American lives have been lost.

Drug / PPE manufacturing jobs must be brought back to the U.S. We can't continue to depend on China.
ICYMI: Helena is receiving a 3D printer that will print swabs to help with Coronavirus testing.  This is a critical tool as we work to safely reopen Montana. https://t.co/67lnc3Jslp

Gallatin Gateway's 8th grade class couldn't make it to DC this year due to the pandemic, but I was glad to visit with this great group of young Montanans over video chat!  #MontanaProud https://t.co/9Trg06z2XO

Worked with @realDonaldTrump to secure critical PPE & testing supplies to help keep Montanans safe. 

Learn more ⬇️ https://t.co/q8IE0KdZMT

This 3D printer is great news for expanding testing in MT as we begin to safely reopen the economy.  I'll continue working to ensure healthcare professionals have the tools they need to increase testing and prioritize public health. https://t.co/UoQdJAx3aj

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for acting on my request to cover Montana’s seasonal workers & businesses through #PPP.  Our outfitters, guides, and more help drive our economy in MT, and I’m glad they’ll now be able to get the relief they need due to COVID-19. https://t.co/elJD2PqXfL
An honor to advocate for COVID19 funding for Indian Country.  #montanaproud https://t.co/GrMd5ujWEE

ICYMI: Last week, I toured the @umontana research lab working around the clock to develop a vaccine for COVID-19.  I’m glad to support the work they’re doing – these life-saving drugs MUST be made in America! https://t.co/gGljjrTUvb

A big thank you to @realDonaldTrump for signing into law additional relief for small businesses and $ for testing and hospitals.  Replenishing the #PaycheckProtectionProgram is critical for Montana small businesses to stay open and keep workers employed. https://t.co/nN23D3rpui

Great visit yesterday in Missoula.  It's incredible @umontana is playing such a big part in research and development of a vaccine for COVID-19.  This is another example of Montanans rising to the challenge during times of need. #MontanaProud https://t.co/D9BKHsEVnF
Just wrapped up a visit to @umontana where they’re doing first-class research on developing a vaccine for COVID-19 right here in Missoula.  #MontanaProud https://t.co/F2zXvgYDsP
Look forward to joining @SethBodnar this AM at @umontana to see some of the amazing work they’re doing to develop a COVID-19 vaccine right here in Montana. https://t.co/nw9OYGpfDh

Glad to see the Senate replenish #PPP which will help keep Montana small business open and workers employed, boost funding to expand testing and provide more relief for hospitals and healthcare providers.

I’m always glad to hear from Montanans, answer their questions from all over the state, and provide an update on what I’m working on during this pandemic.    

https://t.co/bvRgcUu6eB
As our nation works to overcome this pandemic, folks can still enjoy our parks from the comfort of their own home with virtual programs put on by @NatlParkService. #FindYourVirtualPark

I’m on a conference call with @realDonaldTrump @stevenmnuchin1  @MarkMeadows this morning.  We are close to reaching a bipartisan agreement to replenish the Paycheck Protection Program, plus significant increases for testing and hospitals.  Need it now!
This funding will play a critical role to ensure our MT law enforcement officers have the resources they need to protect our communities due to COVID-19.https://t.co/5pdZ11SB7h

Glad to announce 5,000 nasal swab kits to test for COVID-19 were delivered to Helena today.  These swab kits are an important piece of testing that give healthcare providers the tools to help keep Montanans safe and healthy.
https://t.co/ByWUku6miy

Honored to be selected by @realDonaldTrump to serve on the historic task force to safely reopen America.  We can prioritize our public health & our workers, families and small businesses.  Let’s get this done for America!

Glad to see @USDA & @DHSgov take steps to address H2A issues which are harming MT Ag. This step will help protect agricultural-related employment, our nation’s food supply chain, and lessen impacts from the COVID-19 public health emergency.
.@realDonaldTrump is right to hold the @WHO accountable for their response to the COVID-19 outbreak and its work with China.

Our Montana National Guard deserves hazard pay for the work they’re doing on the front lines protecting our communities from COVID-19 – that’s why I’m urging the @WhiteHouse to get it done!

https://t.co/jxRsTdvurf

Our Montana National Guard have been putting their lives at risk to protect Montanans during this pandemic.  That's why I'm urging the Trump Administration to allow them to qualify for hazard pay for the work they're doing during this pandemic. https://t.co/L6MQwxrkmp
RT @SteveDaines: The Montana National Guard is on the front lines of this pandemic.  Cindy and I were happy to show a little piece of our a…

The Montana National Guard is on the front lines of this pandemic.  Cindy and I were happy to show a little piece of our appreciation today by bringing them lunch at the @BozemanAirport. #MontanaProud https://t.co/QxYOmWqDGe
Relying on China for medicine or essential medical equipment is detrimental to our national security and endangers our public health.  We MUST reduce our dependence on China. https://t.co/m40tc6stpT
Great news, the 68,000 N95 masks have officially arrived in Montana!  This will go a long way for our healthcare providers on the front lines.  Glad to have gotten this done for MT.

Glad to help my friend @TroyDowningMT with the work he’s doing to make & deliver hand sanitizer to folks all over our state - including our healthcare professionals & first responders on the front lines of fighting this pandemic.  #MontanaProud https://t.co/uKGYDCtQFF

NEWS: I’ve been working hard all week with the @WhiteHouse @VP and @realDonaldTrump administration to ensure Montana has N95 masks.  

I can now confirm that TOMORROW, 68,000 N95 masks will arrive in Montana.
Just wrapped up another great townhall taking questions on COVID-19 from folks all over the state.  Stay tuned for teletownhall times next week!
ICYMI: I sent a letter to the Secretary of State calling for a full investigation into China's mishandling of the COVID-19 pandemic.  We must hold China accountable. https://t.co/yZ4Puj8KWL
Great MT story of a small business owner being able to keep their doors open, employees paid, and doing their part to take care of those on the front line of this pandemic. https://t.co/mY10NkUfUw

Held another teletownhall this afternoon taking questions from folks all over MT on COVID-19. Thanks to @SenBillCassidy for joining today to help share some of your medical expertise! 

My next teletownhall on COVID-19 is this Thursday at 1 PM. https://t.co/JS9XLcOiYY

Fox News: Sen. Daines pushes State Dept. for global probe of China over coronavirus, suggests 'appropriate punitive actions'.

https://t.co/NZQVtgMoJZ
China could have saved lives but they hid the virus from the world – they must be held accountable! https://t.co/MW4iJVEFtb

This is commonsense.  Montanans don't need any more financial stress during these tough times, and I'm glad to see they'll be getting their money back from cancelled flights due to COVID-19. https://t.co/VN3KtKhyP4
I'm confident and hopeful that it is American innovation that will lead to drugs to treat and prevent COVID-19. https://t.co/f1pDLYCKuH

Grocery stores all over the state are offering special hours of business for our seniors and those who are high risk for #coronavirus!  Visit https://t.co/2mh91zqGli for the details of stores near you, and don’t forget to thank your grocery store workers! https://t.co/FtDon0rEJt

NEWS: Following my request, the @USTreasury announced today that Social Security beneficiaries will be able to receive their direct check WITHOUT having to file taxes.  

Seniors, those with disabilities or low incomes don’t need any more hurdles during this pandemic.

Just wrapped up a teletownhall taking questions from Montanans all over the state regarding COVID-19.  Thanks to all who joined, we’ll continue having these townhalls in the coming days & weeks to answer questions from folks. https://t.co/bcC9BT5lPu

I fought to make $350 billion available for small business loans and 100% forgivable loans for those who keep their employees.  We must protect MT small businesses and workers during the COVID-19  pandemic! https://t.co/f4WaJWmt3r

I’m working hard to ensure that Montanans stuck abroad during this pandemic make it home safely. 

https://t.co/6lVMYQdBKY

We must accelerate drug development and manufacturing to not only treat & prevent COVID-19, but to stop the next pandemic.  There’s amazing American innovation and science out there, and I’m pushing to get those drugs to market ASAP. https://t.co/3Kwl7mokYA

.@realDonaldTrump just signed the Coronavirus economic recovery package into law - a bill that will provide relief for struggling Montanans all over our state.

For all those hurting: help is on the way.

Glad to see the Senate come together and pass this critical economic relief package that will provide much needed help for MT workers, small businesses, healthcare providers, hospitals, tribes and more. 

Together, we will get through this. https://t.co/dcYqB3yvHV
Montanans back home are suffering because of Coronavirus and they need relief now. We MUST pass the Senate bill. Hear some of their stories below ⬇️ https://t.co/GTNmmwNPqt
Thank you for the support, @VP!  Together, once the Senate acts, we’ll be able to accelerate drug development to treat and prevent COVID-19. https://t.co/Ed44K6BnM1

We can’t afford to play political games.  The health and livelihoods of Montanans are at risk.  We need to provide relief now. 
https://t.co/nt1oiuU9dL
RT @SteveDaines: Millions of Americans, along w/ five of our colleagues, are quarantined because of COVID-19 right now. We are in a public…

This bill provides relief for workers, families, small businesses, and healthcare professionals. And this bill was originally written by Rs AND Ds. We must come together and vote this bill out of the Senate NOW.

.@SenSchumer & @SpeakerPelosi - It is wrong and reckless to risk our entire economy and public health by demanding that the bill includes an ideological wish list. This obstruction is having a devastating impact on American workers, families and small businesses.

Millions of Americans, along w/ five of our colleagues, are quarantined because of COVID-19 right now. We are in a public health and economic crisis. We don’t have time for partisan politics. We NEED to come together and get this done for the good of our country.

ICYMI - last week, I held a call w/ Ag leaders from all over MT to hear directly from them on the impact of COVID-19.  Among other things, we discussed my bill to reduce losses for ranchers during this time. https://t.co/gp1C2RBlQz
RT @SteveDaines: Montana workers forced out of their job because of the #Coronavirus need help and relief NOW.
Montana workers forced out of their job because of the #Coronavirus need help and relief NOW.

I’ve been talking w/ MT workers, small business owners, hospital leaders, ag groups, tribal leaders, restaurant & lodging groups & more, hearing directly from them on how they’re being impacted by COVID-19.  

I’m working hard to get folks much needed relief during this virus.
ICYMI: This week I urged the DOJ to investigate market manipulation in cattle markets.  Our ranchers need relief, especially during this virus. https://t.co/vxcdRSwXQD

During these times, it’s important we send prayers to our doctors, nurses, and all healthcare professionals. 

The work you’re doing is saving lives - thank you for everything.

Our ranchers have been challenged for months, and the virus will only make that worse.  That's why I'm calling on the DOJ to investigate market manipulation in the cattle markets and beef industry.
https://t.co/ZWLZhGqRhf
Spoke today with Ag leaders from all over our state on what they’re seeing from coronavirus.  I have their back, and together, we’ll get through this. https://t.co/ueYWJwqr1E
Great step in overcoming this virus.  More work to be done, but together, we’ll get there. https://t.co/HOlB7Eh5Rw

We're all in this together.  For any & all questions you may have about Coronavirus, click below or call one of our offices to speak directly with a member of my staff. 
https://t.co/XE3p10ju68
RT @SteveDaines: Today I voted for paid sick & family leave, waiving all testing costs and providing emergency nutritional assistance for s…
Together, we will overcome this. #coronavirus
Today I voted for paid sick & family leave, waiving all testing costs and providing emergency nutritional assistance for seniors, women, children and low income families. #Coronavirus
I’m fighting to help our working families, small businesses, first responders and healthcare providers during the Coronavirus outbreak. #MTNews https://t.co/OIwrHhk4PY
Speaking to @MontanaChamber today w/ a Coronavirus update on what I’m doing to help protect Montana small businesses, workers, and working families. https://t.co/Xy9eviFrpA

Cindy & I are praying for those who are infected & for their families. We urge all Montanans to take the necessary preventative measures in anticipation of additional cases. I’ll continue to be in contact w/ state and local officials as we work together to combat this virus.

We must come together and work on bold, decisive actions to address the public health & economic situation we’re in because of #Coronavirus. 

I will continue working on an aggressive plan to protect public health, working families & small businesses.
Glad to help ensure employers can cover #Coronavirus tests and treatment for patients! https://t.co/Zay01F5sPb

I’m happy to see the @realDonaldTrump administration act on my proposal to take swift action to remove barriers and help lower the costs for #Coronavirus testing and treatment for Montanans and Americans across the country.
RT @SteveDaines: In response to the #Coronavirus outbreak, I’m pushing for a plan to help protect Montana & American families and stabilize…

Step 3: Access to Affordable Testing 

We need to ensure folks aren’t faced with sky-high out of pocket costs for Coronavirus tests. That’s why I'm urging @stevenmnuchin1 to make the testing a preventive care benefit to help with costs. It is critical we make testing affordable.

Step 2: Paid Leave 

I’m calling for 14 days paid leave. Working families shouldn’t have to choose between their health and their pocketbooks.
In response to the #Coronavirus outbreak, I’m pushing for a plan to help protect Montana & American families and stabilize our economy.
In Belgrade this morning hearing from folks on the importance of Medicare Advantage - one way to ensure Montanans have access to quality healthcare. https://t.co/QvjdqmiFzq
All of MT’s veterans should have access to high quality healthcare - including those in our rural areas. https://t.co/F64F62U2Lh
Happy New Year to all! May this year be filled with health and happiness. #2020

I personally know Lawrence VanDyke and he is not only a good man, but beyond qualified. I will absolutely be voting YES on confirmation. The @ABAesq should be ashamed of their blatant bias, politically motivated intentions and sick attempt to smear his character.
An honor to speak at today’s grand opening of the new Rehabilitation Hospital of Montana. They’re going to be doing incredible work for Billings and our state. https://t.co/vzM4G3c9R9
Great visiting Marcus Daly hospital in Hamilton, glad to get an inside look at their new state of the art surgery center! https://t.co/D6YgDMbnbZ

Montanans are sick and tired of listening to anti-American, anti-Semite, radical Democrats trash our country and our ideals. This is America. We’re the greatest country in the world. 

I stand with @realdonaldtrump. 🇺🇸
